mapper.select: SELECT ID, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE, PROJECT_INFO, VIEWS FROM (SELECT ID, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE, PROJECT_INFO, VIEWS FROM PROJECT ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
SELECT ID, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE, PROJECT_INFO, VIEWS FROM (SELECT ID, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE, PROJECT_INFO, VIEWS FROM PROJECT ORDER BY VIEWS DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
SELECT r.ROLE_NAME FROM PROJECT p INNER JOIN RECRUIT_ROLE r ON p.ID = r.PROJECT_ID WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT p INNER JOIN BOOKMARK b ON p.ID = b.PROJECT_ID WHERE b.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
SELECT ID, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_INFO, PROJECT_TYPE, VIEWS, STATUS, CREATED_AT FROM PROJECT ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT ID, PROJECT_TYPE, STATUS, PROJECT_NAME, CREATED_AT, RECRUIT_COUNT, VIEWS, PROJECT_PROCESS, PROJECT_PURPOSE, EXCEPT_TIME, EXCEPT_DATE, PROJECT_TIME, PROJECT_INFO, OWNER_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID = #{projectId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID IN (SELECT pm.MEMBER_ID FROM PROJECT p INNER JOIN PROJECT_MEMBER pm ON p.ID = pm.PROJECT_ID WHERE P.ID = #{projectId})
SELECT ps.SKILL_NAME FROM PROJECT p INNER JOIN PROJECT_SKILL ps ON p.ID = ps.PROJECT_ID WHERE p.ID = #{projectId}
SELECT r.ROLE_NAME FROM PROJECT p INNER JOIN RECRUIT_ROLE r ON p.ID = r.PROJECT_ID WHERE p.ID = #{projectId}

SELECT MEMBER_ID, USERNAME, POSITION, CAREER, STIME FROM (SELECT SUBSCRIBE.MEMBER_ID, SUBSCRIBE.CREATED_AT AS STIME FROM SUBSCRIBE INNER JOIN PROJECT ON PROJECT.ID = SUBSCRIBE.PROJECT_ID WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}) INNER JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.ID
